data:
Here are multiple definitions of the product idea in one sentence with different product names:

1. Name: RiskGuard
Idea: PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform to educate workers on Occupational Risk Prevention.
2. Name: SafeLearn
Idea: PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform to educate workers on Occupational Risk Prevention.
3. Name: Proximus
Idea: PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform to educate workers on Occupational Risk Prevention.
4. Name: RiskWise
Idea: PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform to educate workers on Occupational Risk Prevention.
5. Name: EduSafe
Idea: PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform to educate workers on Occupational Risk Prevention.
6. Name: Preventia
Idea: PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform to educate workers on Occupational Risk Prevention.
7. Name: SafePro
Idea: PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform to educate workers on Occupational Risk Prevention.
8. Name: RiskAware
Idea: PREVENT-IA is an AI-powered education platform to educate workers on Occupational Risk Prevention.

After analyzing the definitions, I recommend the following product name:

**Name:** SafeLearn
**Idea:** SafeLearn is an AI-powered education platform to educate workers on Occupational Risk Prevention.

The name "SafeLearn" is consistent and relevant, as it clearly communicates the purpose of the product (safety and learning) and is easy to remember. It also has a positive connotation, which can help to build trust with potential customers.
